snippet.title: What the Fog | Gameplay Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
What the Fog is OUT NOW on Steam!  Run, jump, dash, and shoot in this chaotic co-op roguelite. 
 
Get it for FREE with a Behaviour Account: https://bit.ly/what-the-fog 
 
What the Fog?! You’ve been sucked into a cursed boardgame! Now you and a friend will need to work together to survive. Run, jump, dash, and shoot to escape swarms of angry monsters in this chaotic co-op roguelite from the world of Dead by Daylight.
 
Also available on Steam for $4.99 USD: https://bit.ly/getthefogout
 
Conditions apply. Limited number of offers available.
